[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: loading_screen\common\defines\jomini\rivers.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]

NRivers = {
	FADE_IN_DISTANCE = 10.0
	FADE_OUT_DISTANCE = 2.0
	NUM_WIDTH_PIXEL_VALUES = 13 #how many pixels in the river bitmap that are allocated for different river widths
	WIDTH_MIN = 1.0	#how wide the rivers are when using the lowest width in the bitmap
	WIDTH_MAX = 2.2 #how wide the rivers are when using the highest width in the bitmap
	UV_SCALE = 1.0
	#The factor by which FADE_IN_DISTANCE is multiplied is the boundary starting from the river source, where the river is visually invisible.
	FADE_IN_INVISIBLE_DISTANCE_THRESHOLD = 0.5
}
 
-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__F8B016CA23E00CC5922A175A7F85CB9CE0054FBA.txt


----- RAWREF_FILE_BEGIN: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__F8B075C200C707E28DB530169A4DA9FB108EA163.txt
-----
[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\disasters\curse_of_stefan_uros_iii.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
curse_of_stefan_uros_iii = {

	image = "gfx/interface/illustrations/disaster/curse_of_stefan_uros_iii.dds"
	
	monthly_spawn_chance = monthly_spawn_chance_very_high

	fire_only_once = yes

	can_start = {
		tag = SER
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = had_csd_disaster_variable_tt
			NOT = { has_variable = had_serbian_disaster_variable }
		}
		current_year < 1453
		country_rank = country_rank:rank_empire
		character:ser_stefan_dusan = {
			is_alive = no
		}
		ruler ?= { total_abilities <= 250 }
		stability <= 30
		government_power <= 75
	}
	

	can_end = {
		curse_of_stefan_uros_iii_end_trigger = yes
	}
	modifier = {
		monthly_pretender_rebel_growth  = 0.025
		monthly_nationalist_rebel_growth   = 0.025
		monthly_legitimacy = -0.25
	}
	
	on_start = {
		trigger_event_non_silently = curse_of_stefan_uros_iii.1
	}
	on_end = {
		trigger_event_non_silently = curse_of_stefan_uros_iii.2
	}
	
	on_monthly = {
		random_list = {
			20 = { custom_tooltip = an_event_occurs_tt }
			80 = { custom_tooltip = no_event_occurs_tt }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				1000 = {}
				50 = { trigger_event_silently = curse_of_stefan_uros_iii.3 }
				50 = { trigger_event_silently = curse_of_stefan_uros_iii.4 }
				50 = { trigger_event_silently = curse_of_stefan_uros_iii.5 }
				100 = { trigger_event_silently = curse_of_stefan_uros_iii.6 }
			}
		}
	}
}
-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__F8B075C200C707E28DB530169A4DA9FB108EA163.txt

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\unit_abilities\raid_imperial_family_holdings.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
raid_imperial_family_holdings = {
	toggle = no
	army_only = yes
	map = yes
	duration = 30
	cancel_on_combat = yes
	hidden = {
		owner = {
			NOT = { culture = { has_culture_group = culture_group:japanese_group } }
		}
	}
	allow = {
		owner = { culture = { has_culture_group = culture_group:japanese_group } }
		is_army = yes
		in_combat = no
		is_moving = no
		is_exiled = no
		in_siege = no
		unit_location = {
			any_foreign_building_countries_in_location = {
				is_at_war_with = root.owner
				has_reform = government_reform:japanese_imperial_family
			}
			NOT = { has_location_modifier = recently_razed }
		}
	}
	finished_when = {
		OR = {
			in_combat = yes
			is_moving = yes
			is_exiled = yes
			in_siege = yes
		}
	}
	modifier = {
		land_morale_modifier = -0.25
	}

	start_effect = {
		unit_location = {
			random_foreign_building_countries_in_location = {
				limit = { is_at_war_with = root.owner }
				transfer_yearly_gold = {
					value = 0.1
					target = root.owner
				}
				transfer_yearly_manpower = {
					value = 0.1
					target = root.owner
				}
				"war_with_country(root.owner)" = {
					add_bonus_warscore = {
						country = root.owner
						amount = 20
					}
				}
			}
			add_location_modifier = {
				modifier = recently_razed
				years = 1
				mode = add_and_extend
			}
		}
	}
	ai_will_do = {
		add = 25
	}
}
-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__F8FFC7C163773275507D64ACB5B0A7A86B6FC523.txt

	}

		name_key = chaac_god
	}

		global_monthly_prosperity = 0.001
	}
}

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\cabinet_actions\merge_culture_group.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
merge_culture_group = {
	ability = adm
	allow_multiple = no
	years = 10
	potential = {
		culture = { 
			has_any_culture_group = yes
			is_merged_culture_group = no
			any_culture_group = {
				is_already_merged = no
			}
		}
	}
	allow = {
		is_dominant_country_of = culture
		#country_rank = country_rank:rank_empire
	}

	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = culture_group
		target_flag = target
		name = "merge_culture_group_select_culture_group"
		show_why_not_enabled = yes
		none_available_msg_key = "merge_culture_group_no_culture_group"
		column = {
			data = name
		}

		interaction_source_list = {
			scope:actor.culture = {
				every_culture_group = {
					add_to_list = source
				}
			}
		}
		visible = {

		}
		enabled = {
			is_already_merged = no
		}
	}
	country_modifier = {
		monthly_towards_centralization = 0.1
	}
	on_fully_activated = {
		scope:actor = { merge_culture_group = scope:target }		
	}
}

-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__F9C7D3D28C6E20A43379AC5F2B8E3FCB5065FFCC.txt


----- RAWREF_FILE_BEGIN: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__F9F1ABD824F78E6C7EFB6A90C06B00EE249F9509.txt
-----
[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\character_interactions\favor_heir.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
favor_heir = {
	on_own_nation = yes
	message = yes
	potential = {
		scope:actor = {
			has_for_elective_heir_selection = yes
		}
	}
	ai_tick = monthly
	ai_tick_frequency = 1
	allow = {
		scope:actor = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = favor_heir_ct
				NOT = { has_variable = favored_heir }
			}
		}
	}
	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = character
		source = actor
		target_flag = recipient
		name = "choose_character"
		pre_evaluation_sort_value = {
			value = age_in_years
		}
		pre_evaluation_number_to_evaluate_fully = 5
		column = {
			data = name
		}
		visible = {
			is_alive = yes
			is_adult = yes
		}
		enabled = {
			modifier:blocked_from_character_interactions = no
			is_eligible_heir_baseline = scope:actor
			valid_estate_for_heir_selection = scope:actor.succession_law
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = favor_heir_at
				scope:actor = {
					NOT = { is_target_in_variable_list = { name = supported_heirs target = root } }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	effect = {
		scope:recipient = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = favor_heir_tt
				set_variable = {
					name = home_country
					value = scope:actor
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = favor_heir_bt
			scope:actor = {
				set_variable = {
					name = favored_heir
					value = scope:recipient
				}
				add_to_variable_list = {
					name = supported_heirs
					target = scope:recipient
				}
			}
		}
	}
	ai_will_do = {
		value = -100
		add = {
			desc = "POTENTIAL_HEIR_SCORE"
			value = "scope:recipient.heir_score(scope:actor)"
		}
	}
}
-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__F9F1ABD824F78E6C7EFB6A90C06B00EE249F9509.txt


----- RAWREF_FILE_BEGIN: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FA32B69FEB743F4809685C1B5D7C45EA82169403.txt
-----
[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\generic_actions\culture.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
add_accepted_culture = {
	type = owncountry

	potential = {
	}

	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:target
				exists = scope:actor
			}
			scope:actor = {
				culture_population_in_country = {
					culture = scope:target
					value > 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	ai_tick = never
	ai_tick_frequency = 12

	automation_tick = monthly
	automation_tick_frequency = 1
	player_automated_category = cultureacceptance
	
	price = price:add_accepted_culture

	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = culture
		target_flag = target
		source = actor
		source_flags = only_tolerated

		name = "add_accepted_culture_select_culture"
		none_available_msg_key = "add_accepted_culture_no_cultures"
		column = {
			data = name
		}
		visible = {
			not = { is_accepted_in = scope:actor }
		}
		enabled = {
			is_tolerated_in = scope:actor
			NOT = {
				scope:actor.culture = this
			}
			scope:actor = {
				OR = {
					culture_percentage_in_country = {
						culture = root
						value >= 0.025
					}
					
					culture_population_in_country = {
						culture = root
						value >= 1000
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	effect = {
		scope:actor = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:target
				}
				add_accepted_culture = scope:target
			}
		}
	}

	ai_will_do = {
		# handled in code
	}
}

remove_accepted_culture = {
	type = owncountry

	potential = {
	}

	allow = {
	}

	ai_tick = monthly
	ai_tick_frequency = 12

	automation_tick = monthly
	automation_tick_frequency = 1
	player_automated_category = cultureacceptance
	
	price = price:remove_accepted_culture
	price_modifier = {
		if = {
			limit = { 
				exists = scope:target 
			}
			add = {
				desc = "SORT_CULTURE_POPULATION"
				value = "scope:actor.culture_percentage_in_country(scope:target)"
				multiply = 100
			}
		}
	}

	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = culture
		source = actor
		target_flag = target
		source_flags = only_accepted
		name = "remove_accepted_culture_select_culture"
		none_available_msg_key = "remove_accepted_culture_no_cultures"
		column = {
			data = name
		}
	}

	effect = {
		scope:actor = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:target
				}
				remove_accepted_culture = scope:target
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = lose_75_pop_satisfaction_ct
					every_pop = {
						limit = {
							owner = scope:actor
							culture = scope:target
						}
						add_pop_satisfaction = pop_satisfaction_ultimate_penalty
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	ai_will_do = {
		add = {
			desc = "willingness"
			value = 500
		}

		subtract = {
			desc = "less accepted pops"
			scope:actor = {
				value = 100
				multiply = "culture_percentage_in_country(scope:target)"
			}
		}

		# Remove cultures that are below 7.5% if we are at peace and have 50 stability and over our cap
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:actor = {
					OR = {
						used_cultures_capacity <= modifier:cultures_capacity
						stability < 50
						at_war = yes
					}
				}
			}
			multiply = 0
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:actor = {
					"culture_percentage_in_country(scope:target)" > 0.075
				}
			}
			multiply = 0
		}
	}
}

change_primary_culture = {
	type = owncountry

	potential = {
	}

	allow = {
		 scope:actor = {
			is_colonial_subject = no
		 }
	}

	ai_tick = monthly
	ai_tick_frequency = 12

	automation_tick = monthly
	automation_tick_frequency = 1
	player_automated_category = cultureacceptance
	
	price = price:change_primary_culture

	cooldown = {
		type = convert_culture
		years = 10
	}

	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = culture
		source = actor
		target_flag = target
		name = "change_culture_select_culture"
		none_available_msg_key = "change_primary_culture_no_cultures"
		column = {
			data = name
		}
		visible = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					has_game_rule = dynamic_culture
				}
				always = yes
			}
			trigger_else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_game_rule = culture_group_only
				}
				scope:actor = {
					culture = {
						any_culture_group = {
							root = {
								has_culture_group = prev
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			trigger_else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_game_rule = culture_present_in_country
				}
				scope:actor = {
					culture_population_in_country = {
						culture = root
						value > 0
					}
				}
			}
			trigger_else = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		enabled = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					has_game_rule = dynamic_culture
				}
				scope:actor = {
					has_accepted_culture = root
					not = { culture = root }
					OR = {
						dominant_culture ?= root
						ruler ?= { culture = root }
						dominant_upper_class_culture ?= root
					}
				}
			}
			can_change_primary_culture = {
				country = scope:actor
				culture = root
			}
		}
	}

	effect = {
		scope:actor = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:target
				}
				culture = {
					save_scope_as = old_culture
				}
				change_culture = scope:target
				add_accepted_culture = scope:old_culture
			}
		}
	}
	
	ai_will_do = {
		add = {
			desc = "inertia"
			value = -1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:actor = {
					at_war = yes
				}
			}
			multiply = 0
		}

		# change our primiary culture if it is 10% bigger than our current one and we are at peace
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:actor = {
					"culture_percentage_in_country(scope:target)" > { value = "culture_percentage_in_country(scope:actor.culture)" add = 0.1 }
				}
			}
			add = 1000
		}

		subtract = {
			desc = "less accepted pops"
			scope:actor = {
				value = 100
				multiply = "culture_percentage_in_country(scope:target)"
			}
		}
		
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:actor = {
					ruler ?= { culture = scope:actor.culture }
				}
			}
			multiply = 0
		}
	}
}


add_tolerated_culture = {
	type = owncountry

	potential = {
	}

	allow = {
		trigger_if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:target
				exists = scope:actor
			}
			scope:actor = {
				culture_population_in_country = {
					culture = scope:target
					value > 0
				}
			}
		}
	}

	ai_tick = never
	ai_tick_frequency = 12

	automation_tick = monthly
	automation_tick_frequency = 1
	player_automated_category = cultureacceptance
	
	price = price:add_tolerated_culture

	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = culture
		#for the AI we have an optimisation to only look through cultures that are present. Human can look at all...but will have some disabled
		source_ai_override = actor
		target_flag = target
		source_flags_ai_override = include_any_present
		name = "add_tolerated_culture_select_culture"
		none_available_msg_key = "add_tolerated_culture_no_cultures"
		column = {
			data = name
		}
		enabled = {
			NOR = {
				scope:actor.culture = this
				is_tolerated_in = scope:actor
				is_accepted_in = scope:actor
			}
			scope:actor = {
				OR = {
					culture_percentage_in_country = {
						culture = root
						value >= 0.01
					}
				
				
					culture_population_in_country = {
						culture = root
						value >= 1000
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	effect = {
		scope:actor = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:target
				}
				add_tolerated_culture = scope:target
			}
		}
	}
	
	ai_will_do = {
		# handled in code
	}
}

remove_tolerated_culture = {
	type = owncountry

	potential = {
	}

	allow = {
	}

	ai_tick = monthly
	ai_tick_frequency = 12

	automation_tick = monthly
	automation_tick_frequency = 1
	player_automated_category = cultureacceptance
	
	price = price:remove_tolerated_culture
	price_modifier = {
		if = {
			limit = { 
				exists = scope:target 
			}
			add = {
				desc = "SORT_CULTURE_POPULATION"
				value = "scope:actor.culture_percentage_in_country(scope:target)"
				multiply = 100
			}
		}
	}

	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = culture
		source = actor
		target_flag = target
		source_flags = only_tolerated

		
		name = "remove_tolerated_culture_select_culture"
		none_available_msg_key = "remove_tolerated_culture_no_cultures"
		column = {
			data = name
		}
	}

	effect = {
		scope:actor = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:target
				}
				remove_tolerated_culture = scope:target
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = lose_50_pop_satisfaction_ct
					every_pop = {
						limit = {
							owner ?= scope:actor
							culture = scope:target
						}
						add_pop_satisfaction = pop_satisfaction_ultimate_penalty
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	ai_will_do = {
		add = {
			desc = "willingness"
			value = 500
		}

		subtract = {
			desc = "less tolerated pops"
			scope:actor = {
				value = 100
				multiply = "culture_percentage_in_country(scope:target)"
			}
		}

		# Remove cultures that are below 7.5% if we are at peace and have 50 stability and over our cap
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:actor = {
					OR = {
						used_cultures_capacity <= modifier:cultures_capacity
						stability < 50
						at_war = yes
					}
				}
			}
			multiply = 0
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:actor = {
					"culture_percentage_in_country(scope:target)" > 0.075
				}
			}
			multiply = 0
		}
	}
}

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\casus_belli\expansion_into_the_steppes.txt

[CONTENT]
#root is country
#scope:target is the target 

# War against the Hordes
cb_expansion_into_the_steppes = {
	visible = {
		has_unlocked_casus_belli_trigger = { type = cb_expansion_into_the_steppes }
		scope:target = {
			OR = {
				government_type = government_type:steppe_horde
				government_type = government_type:tribe
				capital = {
					OR = {
						sub_continent = sub_continent:north_asia
						region = region:steppes_region
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	allow_creation = {
		is_neighbor_of = scope:target
	}
	speed = 25
	war_goal_type = superiority_against_hordes
}

-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FA589DC7C2EEB679404D3B28687A790803202429.txt

add_location_modifier = {
	global = ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER
	global_past = PAST_ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER
	third = THIRD_ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER
	third_past = PAST_THIRD_ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER
}

add_location_modifier_forever = {
	global = ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER_FOREVER
	global_past = PAST_ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER_FOREVER
	third = THIRD_ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER_FOREVER
	third_past = PAST_THIRD_ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER_FOREVER
}

	global_past = PAST_ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER_DURATION
	third = THIRD_ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER_DURATION
	third_past = PAST_THIRD_ADD_LOCATION_MODIFIER_DURATION

change_raw_material = {
	global = CHANGE_RAW_MATERIAL_EFFECT
	global_past = PAST_CHANGE_RAW_MATERIAL_EFFECT
	third = THIRD_CHANGE_RAW_MATERIAL_EFFECT
	third_past = PAST_THIRD_CHANGE_RAW_MATERIAL_EFFECT
}

change_max_raw_material_workers = {
	global = CHANGE_MAX_RAW_MATERIAL_WORKERS_EFFECT

# _category = { ... } creates a new group with name category ( lead with '_' to create a group )
# first and third indicates first person or third person, default is no or global pronoun
# past indicates past tense, default is future/present
# neg indicates that this is used for negative output values, ie "gain x gold" versus "lose x gold"
# the value given to the localization of a neg version will always be positive

GetHaCWFaction = {
	type = country
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_variable = hacw_preferred_faction_hook
				has_variable = hacw_sided_with_hook
			}
		}
		localization_key = hacw_hook_faction
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_variable = hacw_preferred_faction_cod
				has_variable = hacw_sided_with_cod
			}
		}
		localization_key = hacw_cod_faction
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = hacw_our_faction
		fallback = yes
	}
}

GetHungarianTournamentFate = {
	type = character
	text = {
		trigger = { has_variable = hun_tournament_winning_character_big_gain }
		localization_key = flavor_hun.422.tournament_winning_character_big_gain
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_variable = hun_tournament_winning_character_small_gain }
		localization_key = flavor_hun.422.tournament_winning_character_small_gain
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_variable = hun_tournament_winning_character_small_loss }
		localization_key = flavor_hun.422.tournament_winning_character_small_loss
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_variable = hun_tournament_winning_character_big_loss }
		localization_key = flavor_hun.422.tournament_winning_character_big_loss
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_variable = hun_tournament_losing_character_big_gain }
		localization_key = flavor_hun.422.tournament_losing_character_big_gain
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_variable = hun_tournament_losing_character_small_gain }
		localization_key = flavor_hun.422.tournament_losing_character_small_gain
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_variable = hun_tournament_losing_character_small_loss }
		localization_key = flavor_hun.422.tournament_losing_character_small_loss
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_variable = hun_tournament_losing_character_big_loss }
		localization_key = flavor_hun.422.tournament_losing_character_big_loss
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = flavor_hun.422.fallback
		fallback = yes
	}
}

# Tradition

a_footmen = {
	category = army_infantry
	default = yes
	copy_from = a_age_1_traditions_infantry
	strength_damage_taken = -0.05
	
	
	country_potential = { 
		government_type != government_type:steppe_horde
	}

	#root = location. Checks location_potential first so don't need that scripting in
	mercenaries_per_location = {
		pop_type = burghers
		multiply = 0.1
	}
	
	upgrades_to = a_men_at_arms

	
	maintenance_demand =  early_heavy_infantry_maintenance
	construction_demand = early_heavy_infantry_construction
	
	gfx_tags = { medium_tag }
	

}


a_archers = {
	category = army_infantry
	default = yes
	copy_from = a_age_1_traditions_infantry
	
	strength_damage_done = -0.1
	morale_damage_taken = 0.20
	initiative = 5
	
	light = yes

	upgrades_to = a_crossbowmen

	
	country_potential = { 
		government_type != government_type:steppe_horde
	}

	#root = location. Checks location_potential first so don't need that scripting in
	mercenaries_per_location = {
		pop_type = burghers
		multiply = 0.1
	}
	
	maintenance_demand = archer_infantry_maintenance
	construction_demand = archer_infantry_construction
	gfx_tags = { archer_tag medium_tag }
}

a_camp_followers = {
	category = army_auxiliary
	copy_from = a_age_1_traditions_auxiliary
	gfx_tags = { medium_tag }
	
	country_potential = { 
		and = {
			exists = government_type
			government_type != government_type:steppe_horde
		}
	}

	#root = location. Checks location_potential first so don't need that scripting in
	mercenaries_per_location = {
		pop_type = peasants
		multiply = 0.001
	}
	
	upgrades_to = a_supply_carts

}

a_musketeers = {
	category = army_infantry
	copy_from = a_age_5_absolutism_infantry

	#root = location. Checks location_potential first so don't need that scripting in
	mercenaries_per_location = {
		pop_type = burghers
		multiply = 0.1
	}
	
	upgrades_to = a_fusiliers

uc_bey = { 
	subject_pays = uc_bey_pays
	level = 2
	creation_visible = {
		always = no
	}
	#The only way to create them should be through the appropriate generic_action in the Rise of the Turks situation
	visible_through_diplomacy = { always = no }
	visible_through_treaty = { always = no }
	subject_creation_enabled = { always = no }
	release_country_enabled = { always = no }
	type = location
	join_offensive_wars_always = {
		always = yes
	}
	join_defensive_wars_always = {
		always = yes
	}
	government = monarchy
	diplomatic_capacity_cost_scale = 1.25

	
	has_overlords_ruler = no
	annexation_speed = 1
	overlord_can_cancel = no
	
	can_overlord_build_roads = yes
	can_overlord_build_buildings = yes
	can_overlord_build_rgos = yes
	
	can_overlord_recruit_regiments = yes
	can_overlord_build_ships = yes
	
	has_limited_diplomacy = yes
	food_access = yes
	
	can_change_rank = no
	can_change_heir_selection = no

	only_overlord_culture = yes
	only_overlord_court_language = yes

	great_power_score_transfer = 0.25 # the amount of Great Power Score that is transferred from the Subject to the Overlord
	
	institution_spread_to_overlord = monthly_institution_spread_mild
	institution_spread_to_subject = monthly_institution_spread_mild
	
	overlord_modifier = {
		monthly_towards_decentralization = societal_value_tiny_monthly_move
	}
	subject_modifier = {
		always_allow_army_levies = yes
	}
	
	
	on_enable = {
		add_reform = government_reform:anatolian_beylik
		add_reform = government_reform:uc_bey_reform
		add_to_global_variable_list = { name = eligible_beylik_list target = root }
	}
	on_disable = {
		remove_list_global_variable = { 
			name = eligible_beylik_list 
			target = root 
		}
	}
	#on_monthly = { }

	strength_vs_overlord = -0.5
	
	diplo_chance_accept_subject = {
		base = -90
		current_strength = 0.2
		border_distance = -0.3
		negative_opinion = -5
		positive_opinion = 0.25
		rank_difference = -5
		giving_defensive_support = 2
		receiving_defensive_support = 5
		royal_ties = 1

		num_of_limited_subjects = -5
		culture_war = 3
		diplomatic_reputation = 1
		different_religion = -20
		same_common_language = 5
		same_court_language = 10
		different_culture = -10
		different_government_type = -25
		actor_at_war = -20
		competing_power = -200
		tax_base = -0.25
		
		reject_subjugation_reasons = -1
		accept_subjugation_reasons = 1
	}

	diplo_chance_accept_overlord = {
		base = 20
		border_distance = -0.3
		negative_opinion = -5
		positive_opinion = 0.25
		same_common_language = 5
		same_court_language = 10
		different_culture = -10
		different_government_type = -25
		actor_at_war = -20
		competing_power = -200
	}
}

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\parliament_agendas\readme.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
# <parliament agenda key> = {
# 	type = country/international_organization	#setup for what scope this parliament agenda is intended for, by default country
# 	estate = <estate type>						#for which estate type this agenda applies, ignorable if type != country, can have multiple entries
# 	special_status = <special status key>		#for which special status types this agenda applies, ignorable if type != international_organization, can have multiple entries
# 	potential = {}								#trigger with the scope defined from type (root = country/international_organization; if country then target = estate_type, target = special_status), will only show agendas which fulfill the potential
# 	allow = {}									#trigger with the scope defined from type, for IOs the allow is checked for the actor so only specific members are allowed to pass the agenda, for countries the allow is only checked via is_available_for and is_allowed_for which is used in select_triggers primarily (root = country/international_organization; if country then target = estate_type, target = special_status)
# 	on_accept = {}								#effect with the scope defined from type (root = country/international_organization; if country then target = estate_type, target = special_status)
#   on_bribe = {}                               #effect which are applied to the briber country when using bribe_estate; not used for IO agendas (root = briber, target = estate_type, recipient = bribee)
#   can_bribe = {}                              #trigger which are applied to the briber country when using bribe_estate; not used for IO agendas (root = briber, target = estate_type, recipient = bribee)
# 	chance = {}									#scriptvalue with the scope defined from type (root = country/international_organization; if country then target = estate_type, target = special_status)
#   importance = <script value>					#scriptvalue with the scope defined from type (root = country/international_organization; if country then target = estate_type, target = special_status), the higher the importance, the greater the impact on the parliament issue; will always be set to 1 if not defined
# }
-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FBAAEE824D34506F5D89A99050C1244C214E7ED8.txt

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\resolutions\christiana_pietas.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
christiana_pietas = {
	international_organization_type = catholic_church

	potential = {
		papacy_active = yes
	}

	allow = {
		scope:actor = {
			is_member_of_international_organization = international_organization:catholic_church
		}
		religion:catholic = {
			NOT = { has_religion_modifier = christiana_pietas }
			modifier:curia_actions_blocked = no
		}
	}

	can_vote = {
		international_organization:catholic_church = {
			country_has_special_status = {
				type = special_status:curia
				country = scope:actor
			}
		}
	}

	votes = {
		add = {
			desc = "[cardinal_s|e]"
			value = scope:actor.num_cardinals
		}
	}

	proposal_price = price:propose_curia_action

	months = 6

	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = international_organization
		target_flag = recipient
		name = "choose_international_organization"
		column = {
			data = name
		}
		visible = {
			international_organization_type = international_organization_type:catholic_church
		}
		enabled = {
		}
	}

	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = boolean
		target_flag = vote
		name = "select_vote"
		column = {
			data = name
		}
		visible = {
		}
		enabled = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					this = no
				}
				#can't select "no" when proposing something
				scope:recipient = {
					resolution_is_active = resolution:christiana_pietas
				}
			}
			trigger_else = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
	}

	effect = {
		religion:catholic = {
			add_religion_modifier = {
				modifier = christiana_pietas
				years = 10
				mode = replace
			}
		}
	}
	
	reject_effect = {
		scope:proposer = {
			add_prestige = prestige_extreme_penalty
		}
	}

	ai_will_do = {
		scope:actor = {
			add = {
				value = heathen_population_fraction
				multiply = 100
			}
		}
		#bias for the "no" vote, but only for votes, not for proposals.
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:proposer
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:vote = no
				}
				multiply = {
					desc = "BIAS_FOR_VOTE_AGAINST_IT"
					value = -1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	ai_proposer_risk = {
		value = "scope:actor.currency_utility(prestige|-20)"
	}
}

-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FBE641BD557B8030895857AE43AE2F462B6D5643.txt


----- RAWREF_FILE_BEGIN: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FC18B96CC058BCA6451A6E2D3AA7DC0DFACCD57C.txt

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\disasters\coup_attempt.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
coup_attempt = {

	image = "gfx/interface/illustrations/disaster/coup_attempt.dds"

	monthly_spawn_chance = monthly_spawn_chance_very_low

	can_start = {
		government_type = government_type:monarchy
		government_power < 30
		any_estate = {
			estate_type != estate_type:crown_estate
			power > "root.estate_power(estate_type:crown_estate)"
		}
		"estate_power(estate_type:crown_estate)" < 0.5
		in_civil_war = no
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = recently_had_coup_attempt_inconclusive_tt
			NOT = { has_variable = recently_had_coup_attempt_inconclusive_or_negative_variable }
		}
		has_any_active_disaster = no
	}
	
	can_end = { coup_attempt_end_trigger = yes }
	modifier = {
		global_crown_estate_power = -0.25
		country_cabinet_efficiency = -0.2
		court_spending_cost = 0.05
	}
	
	on_start = {
		trigger_event_non_silently = coup_attempt.1
	}
	on_end = {
		if = {
			limit = { government_type = government_type:monarchy }
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						had_disaster_for_years = {
							disaster_type = scope:disaster
							years >= 5
						}
						has_variable = recently_had_coup_attempt_inconclusive_or_negative_variable
					}
				}
				trigger_event_non_silently = coup_attempt.100 #Inconclusive Ending
			}
			else = { trigger_event_non_silently = coup_attempt.101 } #Conspirators eliminated or restored Legitimacy
		}
		else = { trigger_event_non_silently = coup_attempt.200 } #Weird Ending
	}
	
	on_monthly = {
		random_list = {
			175 = { custom_tooltip = an_event_occurs_tt }
			825 = { custom_tooltip = no_event_occurs_tt }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				50 = { trigger_event_silently = coup_attempt.3 }	#~5% Chance
				50 = { trigger_event_silently = coup_attempt.2 }	#~5% Chance
				50 = { trigger_event_silently = coup_attempt.5 }	#~5% Chance
				50 = { trigger_event_silently = coup_attempt.8 }	#~5% Chance
			    800 = { }											#~75% Chance
			}
		}
	}
}

market = {
	name = {
		sort = {
			sort_text = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = root
					}
					value = "SORT_TEXT_MARKET_NAME"
				}
				else = {
					value = "MODIFIER_NONE"
				}
			}
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "SORT_TEXT_NAME_TT"
		}
	}

	market_food = {
		widget = market_food
		width = 100
		fixed_height = 32
		is_constant_width = yes
		sort = {
			sort_value = {
				value = market_food
			}
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "MARKET_SORT_BY_FOOD"
		}
	}
	market_food_percentage = {
		widget = market_food_percentage
		width = 100
		fixed_height = 32
		is_constant_width = yes
		sort = {
			sort_value = {
				value = market_food_percentage
			}
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "MARKET_SORT_BY_FOOD_PERCENTAGE"
		}
	}
}

lesson_admin = {
    chain = lesson_chain_basics
	delay = 0
	gui_tag = "tutorial_admin"
	start_automatically = no

    #### ECONOMY

    # Direct Player to Economy panel
    lesson_economy_1 = {
        text = "lesson_economy_1_desc"
        highlight_widget = "economy_tab_button"
		highlight_widget = "tab_markets"

		trigger_transition = {
			button_id = "next"
			button_text = "tutorial_lesson_button_next"
			target = lesson_economy_2
            trigger = {
                custom_tooltip = {
					text = "lesson_admin_open_economy"
                    OR = {
                        is_widgetid_open = economy_lateralview
                        is_widgetid_open = markets_tab_content
						is_widgetid_open = trading_tab_content
						is_widgetid_open = trade_overview
                    }
				}
                custom_tooltip = {
                    text = "lesson_admin_open_markets"
                    is_widgetid_open = markets_tab_content
                }
            }
		}

		effect = {
			hidden_effect = {
				set_tutorial_var = {
					name = tutorial_header
					value = yellow
				}
			}
		}
    }

    # Markets
    lesson_economy_2 = {
		highlight_widget = "market_list"
        text = "lesson_economy_2_desc"
		animation = right

		gui_transition = {
			button_id = "back"
			button_text = "tutorial_lesson_button_back"
			target = lesson_economy_1
		}
		gui_transition = {
			button_id = "next"
			button_text = "tutorial_lesson_button_next"
			target = lesson_economy_3
		}
    }

	# Markets
    lesson_economy_3 = {
		# highlight_widget = "market_list"
        text = "lesson_economy_3_desc"
		animation = right

		gui_transition = {
			button_id = "back"
			button_text = "tutorial_lesson_button_back"
			target = lesson_economy_2
		}
		gui_transition = {

                    is_widgetid_open = production_lateralview

			button_text = "tutorial_lesson_button_next"
			target = lesson_admin_28
            trigger = {
                custom_tooltip = {
					text = "lesson_admin_open_government"
                    OR = {
                        is_widgetid_open = government_lateralview
                        is_widgetid_open = societal_values_lateralview
                        is_widgetid_open = mission_lateralview
                    }
				}
                custom_tooltip = {
                    text = "lesson_admin_open_missions"
					OR = {
						game_has_missions_enabled = no
                  	 	is_widgetid_open = mission_lateralview
					}
                }
            }
		}
    }

			button_text = "tutorial_lesson_button_next"
			target = lesson_admin_28

                custom_tooltip = {
					text = "lesson_admin_open_government"

                custom_tooltip = {

road_building = {
	age = age_1_traditions
	icon = road_building
	research_cost = 2.0
	has_road_building = yes
	
	unlock_road_type = gravel_road

	requires = city_building_advance
}

paved_road_advance = {
	age = age_3_discovery
	unlock_road_type = paved_road
	requires = crown_power_advance_discovery

	ai_weight = { add = 100 }
}



modern_road_advance = {
	age = age_5_absolutism
	unlock_road_type = modern_road
	requires = scientific_mapping_advance

	ai_weight = { add = 100 }
}

	age = age_6_revolutions
	unlock_road_type = railroad
	requires = steel_mill_advance

	ai_weight = { add = 100 }
}

	ability = dip

	allow = {
		has_countries_with_timed_antagonism = yes
	}

	country_modifier = {
		antagonism_monthly_change_modifier = 0.1 #speed up those decays, lads
	}

	is_finished = {
		scope:actor = {
			has_countries_with_timed_antagonism = no
		}
	}
}

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\estate_privileges\readme.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
# Estate Privileges
#
# A set of privileges that can be implemented for any of your estates.
#
# ATTRIBUTES
#
# - estate: <estate type tag> the estate the privilege applies to
# - potential: trigger for whether the action is possible (root = country)
# - allow: trigger for whether the action can start (root = country)
# - years:
# - months:
# - weeks:
# - days: <ints> all used to define how long it takes to become fully implemented. Modifiers will be scaled by how much of this time is completed.
# - on_activate: <effect> fired when the action is chosen (root = country)
# - on_fully_activated: <effect> fired when the action's implementation reaches 100% (instant if there's no time delay)
# - on_deactivate: <effect> fired when the action is removed (root = country)
# - country_modifier: <scaled and triggered modifier (scale = script for the scale, potential_trigger = trigger for if the modifier applies)> which is applied to whole countries
# - province_modifier: <scaled and triggered modifier (scale = script for the scale, potential_trigger = trigger for if the modifier applies)> which is applied to provinces
# - location_modifier: <scaled and triggered modifier (scale = script for the scale, potential_trigger = trigger for if the modifier applies)> which is applied to locations
# - can_revoke: trigger when you should be capable of removing an enacted privilege
-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FD8A3EDE7E0435976E3C935748F7B28BC4065083.txt

		global_max_literacy = 5

		global_hostile_attrition = 1

		catholic = negative
		bogomilism = negative
		bosnian_church = negative
		catharism = negative
		orthodox = negative
		miaphysite = negative
		nestorianism = negative
		paulicianism = negative
		strigolniki = negative
		waldensian = negative

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\scripted_diplomatic_objectives\readme.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
#<name> = {
#   #How many days to wait before checking for new objectives again
#   ai_tick_frequency = <int/script value>
#   
#   #ROOT = actor
#   actor_trigger = { }
#
#   #scope:recipient = potential country, scope:actor = actor
#   recipient_trigger = { }
#
#   #scope:recipient = potential country, scope:actor = actor
#   #Used when sorting which countries and objectives should be prioritized, is used to compare with other scripted objectives as well
#   recipient_priority = <float/scripted value>
#
#   #Used to narrow down potential countries, if not present all reachable countries will be used
#   recipient_list_builder = { <list builder> }
#
#   #Used to check if an objective should be paused until the next check. Can be used to avoid deleting objectives in cancel_trigger
#   #scope:recipient = potential country, scope:actor = actor
#   pause_trigger = { }
#
#   #Used to check if an objective should be canceled prematurely
#   #scope:recipient = potential country, scope:actor = actor
#   cancel_trigger = { }
#
#   #Should the nations improve relations
#   improve_relation = <yes/no>
#   #To which opinion should the country improve relations, optional, if not present AI will improve up to max
#   improve_relations_limit = <int/scripted value>
#   #Should the actor try to defend the recipient
#   defensive_support = <yes/no>
#   #Should the actor use hostile country interactions/relations against the recipient
#   antagonise = <yes/no>
#   #Should the actor try to destroy recipient
#   destroy = <yes/no>
#
#   #Yes to encourage, No to disable
#   country_interactions = {
#       <country interaction> = <yes/no>
#   }
#   #Yes to encourage, No to disable and cancel if possible
#   country_relations = {
#       <country relation> = <yes/no>
#   }
#   
#   #How much time does the actor have to complete an objective before cancelling, leave empty or 0 for unlimited time
#   #scope:recipient = potential country, scope:actor = actor
#   time_limit = <days/scripted value>
#
#   #How many objectives of the same type can a nation have at once. Leave 0 for unlimited. Default is unlimited.
#   #ROOT = actor
#   max_allowed = <int/scripted value>
#
#}
-----

----- RAWREF_FILE_BEGIN: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FE197200E079C5609CF4C9D1A8993E53EF2C22AF.txt

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\script_values\chinese_expedition.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]

# Function that calculates a score between 0 and 1 for the likelihood of the AI to respond to the Treasure Voyage events
chinese_expedition_scoring_function = {
	value = 0.5
	add = { #dip skill of the chosen expedition leader from -0.3 to 0.3
		value = scope:expedition_initiator.var:chinese_expedition_expedition_leader.dip 
		divide = 100
		subtract = 0.5
		multiply = 0.3
	}
	add = { # Inward vs Outward Society Value, from -0.05 to 0.05
		value = societal_value:outward_vs_inward
		multiply = -1
		multiply = 0.05
	}
	add = { # Difference in country ranks -0.15 to 0.15
		value = scope:expedition_initiator.country_rank_level
		subtract = country_rank_level
		multiply = 0.05
	}
	min = 0
	max = 1
}

chinese_expedition_positive_ai_weight = {
	value = {
		value = chinese_expedition_scoring_function
		subtract = 0.5
		max = 0
	}
	multiply = 1.5
}

chinese_expedition_neutral_ai_weight = {
	value = 0.5
}

chinese_expedition_negative_ai_weight = {
	value = {
		value = 0.5
		subtract = chinese_expedition_scoring_function
		min = 0
	}
	multiply = 1.5
}

chinese_expedition_very_negative_ai_weight = {
	value = {
		value = 0.75
		subtract = chinese_expedition_scoring_function
		min = 0
	}
	multiply = 5
}

chinese_expedition_very_positive_ai_weight = {
	value = {
		value = chinese_expedition_scoring_function
		subtract = 0.75
		max = 0
	}
	multiply = 5
}

-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FE197200E079C5609CF4C9D1A8993E53EF2C22AF.txt

# Work of art type. Types and benefits of different works of art.
#
# captured: can this work of art be captures (yes/no)
# allow: trigger to determine of the work of art type is allowed (root = character)
# location_modifier: modifier applied to the location of the work of art
# country_modifier: modifier applies to the owner of the work of art
# religion_scale_modifier: modifier applies to the whole religion
-----

country = {
	name = {
		widget = country_name
		width = 150
		fixed_height = 32
		is_constant_width = no
		sort = {
			sort_text = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = root
					}
					value = "SORT_TEXT_COUNTRY_NAME"
				}
				else = {
					value = "MODIFIER_NONE"
				}
			}
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "COUNTRY_SORT_BY_NAME"
		}
	}
	
	population = {
		widget = country_population
		width = 100
		fixed_height = 32
		sort = {
			sort_value = {
				value = total_population
			}
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "COUNTRY_SORT_BY_POPULATION"
		}
	}

	great_power_score = {
		widget = country_great_power_score
		width = 100
		fixed_height = 32
		sort = {
			sort_key = "gp"
			sort_value = {
				value = great_power_score
			}
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "COUNTRY_SORT_BY_GREAT_POWER_SCORE"
		}
	}

	heir_status_icon = {
		widget = country_heir_status_icon
		width = 32
		fixed_height = 32
	}

	characters_eligible_for_royal_marriage = {
		widget = country_characters_eligible_for_royal_marriage
		width = 175
		fixed_height = 60
	}

		widget = country_ruler
		width = 100
		fixed_height = 32
	}

		widget = country_rivals
		width = 190
		fixed_height = 70
		is_constant_width = no
		contains_select_target_button = yes
		single_widget_for_row = yes
		sort = {
			sort_key = "name"
			sort_text = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = root
					}
					value = "SORT_TEXT_COUNTRY_NAME"
				}
				else = {
					value = "MODIFIER_NONE"
				}
			}
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "COUNTRY_SORT_BY_NAME"
		}
		sort = {
			sort_key = "their_opinion"
			sort_value = {
				value = "root.opinion(scope:actor)"
			}
			sort_order = "Ascending"
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "COUNTRY_SORT_BY_OPINION"
		}
		sort = {
			sort_key = "our_opinion"
			sort_value = {
				value = "scope:actor.opinion(root)"
			}
			sort_order = "Ascending"
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "COUNTRY_SORT_BY_OUR_OPINION"
		}
		sort = {
			sort_key = "is_rival_of"
			sort_value = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						root = {
							is_rival_of = scope:actor
						}
					}
					value = -1000
				}
				else = {
					value = "root.opinion(scope:actor)"
				}
			}
			sort_order = "Ascending"
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "COUNTRY_SORT_BY_RIVALS"
		}
		sort = {
			sort_key = "is_enemy_of"
			sort_value = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						root = {
							is_enemy_of = scope:actor
						}
					}
					value = -1000
				}
				else = {
					value = "root.opinion(scope:actor)"
				}
			}
			sort_order = "Ascending"
			sort_by_tooltip_key = "COUNTRY_SORT_BY_ENEMIES"
		}
	}

[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\scripted_relations\grant_administrative_autonomy.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
appanage_grant_admin_autonomy =  { # Mirror Divert Trade
	type = subject
	category = {
		offer = CATEGORY_SUBJECT_ACTIONS
		cancellation = CATEGORY_SUBJECT_ACTIONS
	}
	break_on_war = yes
	relation_type = oneway

	visible = {
		scope:actor = {
			has_reform = government_reform:french_feudal_nobility
			is_human = yes
		}	
		scope:recipient = {
			is_subject_type = appanage
			is_subject_of = scope:actor
		}		
	}	
	
	
	offer_enabled = {
		scope:recipient = {
			at_war = no
		}		
	}	
	
	offer_effect = {
		scope:actor = {
			add_prestige = prestige_mild_penalty
			change_societal_value = { 
				type = centralization_vs_decentralization	
				value = societal_value_tiny_move_to_right	
			}			
			reverse_add_opinion = {
				target = scope:recipient
				modifier = opinion_granted_appanage_admin_autonomy
			}	
		}	
	}
	cancel_effect = {
		scope:recipient = {
			remove_opinion = {
				target = scope:actor
				modifier = opinion_granted_appanage_admin_autonomy
			}	
		}	
	}
	request_visible = { always = no }
	break_visible = { always = no }	
}	

-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FF03E7E3392FE3057F14AE9578B151F9634EF1A8.txt

[HEADER]

[CONTENT]
#root is country
#scope:target is the target 


cb_dissolve_tatar_yoke = {

	visible = {
		international_organization:tatar_yoke ?= {
			country_has_special_status = {
				type = special_status:tatar_tax_collector
				country = root
			}
		}
		scope:target = c:GLH
	}
	allow_creation = {
		OR = {
			country_rank = country_rank:rank_kingdom
			country_rank = country_rank:rank_empire
		}
	}

	war_goal_type = dissolve_tatar_yoke_wargoal
}

-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FF6E43C10A8CD59986C72038C4D781DE6E0C5BDD.txt


----- RAWREF_FILE_BEGIN: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FFB62B9E309CAA6414AEFD30DBD01053CADFCFB7.txt
-----
[HEADER]
TIER: 0
FILE: RAW_REFERENCE
BUCKET: COMMON
SOURCE_RELATIVE: in_game\common\country_interactions\ask_join_war_for_favors.txt
NOTE: Auto-extracted verbatim reference. No interpretation.

[CONTENT]
ask_join_war_for_favors = {
	type = diplomacy
	category = CATEGORY_INFLUENCE_ACTIONS

	diplomatic_cost = ask_join_war_for_favors_cost
	
	potential = {
		scope:actor = {
			at_war = yes
			any_current_war = {
				not = { is_in_war = root }
				or = {
					attacker_leader = scope:actor
					defender_leader = scope:actor
				}
			}
		}
	}

	allow = {
	}
	
	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = country
		target_flag = recipient
		interaction_source_list = {
			scope:actor = {
				every_country_that_can_be_called_offensively = {
					add_to_list = source
				}
				every_country_that_can_be_called_defensively = {
					add_to_list = source
				}
			}
		}
		name = "choose_country"
		show_why_not_enabled = yes
		none_available_msg_key = "no_valid_countries"
		column = {
			data = name
		}
		visible = {
		}
        enabled = {
			scope:actor = {
				any_current_war = {
					not = { is_in_war = root }
					trigger_if = {
						limit = {
							attacker_leader = scope:actor
						}
						root = {
							can_join_offensive_war_with = scope:actor
						}
					}
					trigger_else_if = {
						limit = {
							defender_leader = scope:actor
						}
						root = {
							can_join_defensive_war_with = scope:actor
						}
					}
					trigger_else = {
						always = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	select_trigger = {
		looking_for_a = war
		target_flag = war
		interaction_source_list = {
			scope:actor = {
				every_current_war = {
					add_to_list = source
				}
			}
		}
		cache_interaction_source_list = yes
		name = "choose_war_to_join"
		column = {
			data = name
		}
		visible = {
		}
        enabled = {
			not = { is_in_war = scope:recipient }

			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_civil_war_for = scope:actor
					scope:actor = { is_subject_or_below_of = scope:recipient }
				}
				war_length > MONTHS_BEFORE_OVERLORD_CAN_JOIN_CIVIL_WAR
			}

			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					attacker_leader = scope:actor
				}
				can_join_as_attacker = scope:recipient
				NOT = {
					defender_leader = {
						is_subject_or_below_of = scope:recipient
					}
				}
				scope:recipient = {
					can_join_offensive_war_with = scope:actor
					NOT = {
						has_truce_with = root.defender_leader
					}
				}
			}
			trigger_else_if = {
				limit = {
					defender_leader = scope:actor
				}
				can_join_as_defender = scope:recipient
				NOT = {
					attacker_leader = {
						is_subject_or_below_of = scope:recipient
					}
				}
				scope:recipient = {
					can_join_defensive_war_with = scope:actor
					NOT = {
						has_truce_with = root.attacker_leader
					}
				}
			}
			trigger_else = {
				always = no
			}
		}
	}

	ai_will_do = {
		add = 10
	}
	
	effect = {
        scope:war = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					attacker_leader = scope:actor
				}
				scope:recipient = {
					join_war_as_attacker = {
						war = prev
						call_in_subjects = yes
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					defender_leader = scope:actor
				}
				scope:recipient = {
					join_war_as_defender = {
						war = prev
						call_in_subjects = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

-----
----- RAWREF_FILE_END: plugin\RAW_BUCKETS\COMMON\RAWREF__FFB62B9E309CAA6414AEFD30DBD01053CADFCFB7.txt

jap_clan_spy_objective = {
    days_between_checks = 365
    actor_trigger = { 
        exists = situation:nanbokuchou
        is_member_of_international_organization = international_organization:japanese_shogunate
    }

    recipient_trigger = {
        scope:recipient = {
            is_member_of_international_organization = international_organization:japanese_shogunate
        }

        scope:recipient = {
            num_locations < 1
        }
        "scope:actor.relative_military_strength(scope:recipient)" > 0.5

        or = {
            and = {
                scope:actor = {
                     has_variable = supports_northern_court
                }
                scope:recipient = {
                     has_variable = supports_southern_court
                }
            }
            and = {
                scope:actor = {
                     has_variable = supports_southern_court
                }
                scope:recipient = {
                     has_variable = supports_northern_court
                }
            }
        }
    }

    recipient_priority = {
        add = {
            value = 50
        }
        if = {
            limit = {
                not = { scope:actor.capital = scope:recipient.capital }
            }
            divide = "scope:actor.capital.distance_to(scope:recipient.capital)"
        }
    }

    pause_trigger = { 
        always = no
    }

    cancel_trigger = {
        "scope:actor.relative_military_strength(scope:recipient)" < 0.5
    }

    country_interactions = {
       scout_enemy_holdings = yes
    }

    destroy = yes
    spy_network_target = 70
    fabricate_cb = "cb_nanbokuchou"

    max_allowed = 2
}

jap_clan_improve_opinion_with_emperor = {
    days_between_checks = 365

    actor_trigger = { 
        is_member_of_international_organization = international_organization:japanese_shogunate
        country_exists = c:JAP
        c:JAP = {
            opinion = {
                target = root 
                value < 100
            }
        }
    }

    recipient_trigger = {
        scope:recipient = {
            this = international_organization:japanese_shogunate.leader_country
        }
    }

    recipient_priority = {
        value = 50
    }

    pause_trigger = { 
        always = no
    }

    cancel_trigger = {
        country_exists = c:JAP
        c:JAP = {
            opinion = {
                target = scope:actor
                value > 175
            }
        }
    }

    improve_relation = yes

    max_allowed = 1
}

		}

asian_austronesian_ethnicity = {
	template = "asian_ethnicity"
	
	skin_color = {
